content: I'm creating this thread to collect some of the discussion about reorganizing the guide...

Basically, there are two issues we want to resolve, both of which require some discussion:

  1. Part 1 of the guide feels like a large collection of random things. It would be nice to break it into smaller, more logical units
  2. Niko and Santiago were suggesting that we should move more procedure-related stuff to the forge and just link extensively to it from the guide. That way the guide would be mostly about how the compiler works.
Related: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/pull/753 does some breaking up of Part 1
